devdoc.details: This contract manages the Permit2 functionality and access control.

ChangedPermit2(bool).details: Emitted when the Permit2 setting is changed.

constructor.details: Initializes the Permit2Hub contract with the provided Permit2 address and owner address.

params._permit2: The address of the Permit2 contract.

isPermit2Enabled(address,address).details: Checks if Permit2 is enabled for the given owner and spender addresses.

params.spender: The spender address, needs to be the permit2 contract.

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether Permit2 is enabled.

setPermit2(bool).details: Sets the Permit2 status for a specific address.

params.enabled: The status to set for the address.

togglePermit2().details: Toggles the global Permit2 setting. Can only be called by the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

permit2.details: The address of the Permit2 contract.

permit2Disabled.details: Flag to indicate whether Permit2 is disabled.

permit2DisabledForAddress.details: Mapping to track addresses for which Permit2 is disabled.

devdoc.title: Permit2Hub
